about.heading: About Me
about.text: I am an MBA candidate and experienced Software Engineer based in Munich with a background in aerospace, cloud-native systems, and strategic innovation. My work focuses on DevSecOps, CI/CD pipelines, automation, and infrastructure for complex applications. Through roles at ASMPT, ALTEN, and MdynamiX, I’ve developed a robust ability to blend technical expertise with strategic vision.

projects.heading: Strategic Projects
projects.subheading: Key initiatives I've driven across engineering and business strategy:

asmpt.title: DevOps Infrastructure for ASMPT
asmpt.description: Designed and deployed automated testing and CI/CD pipelines, improving release efficiency and quality assurance.

devsecops.title: Business-Focused DevSecOps Research
devsecops.description: Conducted in-depth analysis of DevSecOps challenges for cloud-native platforms leveraging Kubernetes and Docker.

gabon.title: Strategic Digital Solution for Government in Gabon
gabon.description: Created innovative digital platforms to enhance government service delivery and citizen engagement.

fintech.title: Fintech Solution for African Market
fintech.description: Developed scalable fintech applications addressing unique challenges in African financial ecosystems.

contact.heading: Get In Touch
contact.text: Open to strategy, tech leadership, and innovation roles across Europe and beyond.
